text: Ferenc Velkey (November 15, 1915 – September 12, 2008) was a Hungarian field handball player who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. Born in Nagykáta, he was part of the Hungarian field handball team, which finished fourth in the Olympic tournament. He played three matches. ==References== *Ferenc Velkey's profile at Sports Reference.com Category:1915 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Field handball players at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Hungarian male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Hungary
title: Ferenc Velkey
